message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. We believe it holds immense value for someone like you who appreciates its unique features and benefits. Considering its worth to us and its potential value to you, we are offering this exceptional product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as we are confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal satisfaction.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is above my budget. Considering the product's value to me, I'd be willing to pay $1,000,000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value while allowing for a reasonable profit for you. I'm confident that this offer will be mutually beneficial and will allow us to close the deal quickly.
